discussion_comments.comment_body: `shx chmod` 在 windows 应该不会报错，可以忽略
哦，确实shx可以执行chmod，此外shx还支持rm命令
那个脚本好像没得用，用shx rm -rf去删应该就可以了

commented_code:
"dist"
   ],
   "scripts": {
-    "clean": "rm -rf build",
-    "build": "rm -rf build && rslib build && shx chmod +x dist/*.{js,cjs}",
+    "clean": "shx rm -rf build",
+    "build": "shx rm -rf build && rslib build && shx chmod dist/*.{js,cjs}",

discussion_comments.comment_body:
```suggestion
    "build": "shx rm -rf build && rslib build && shx chmod +x dist/*.{js,cjs}",
```
